name: secure-auth-ai
description: SecureAuthAI is an npm package designed for web developers seeking to implement secure sign-up and log-in functionalities with advanced security measures. It includes multi-factor authentication (MFA), anomaly detection, and integrates seamlessly with PostgreSQL databases. Developed in JavaScript with a Python backend, SecureAuthAI supports popular frameworks like React, Vue, and Angular, providing real-time user management and AI-based security features.
author: Jai Joshi
